path.style: vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; fill: rgb(192, 43, 52); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(40, 34, 29); stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
